name: Tatem Games
overview:
Tatem Games is a leading Eastern-European mobile game developer with over 15 years of professional expertise. It emerged from Action Forms, which made PC games (most notable releases: Carnivores, Vivesector, Cryostasis), worked on Palm OS titles and currently produces iOS games.

For two years of presence on the AppStore Tatem Games has published 6 full-featured gaming applications, including 5 titles for iOS: Racer, iGibbets, Carnivores: Dinosaur Hunter, Carnivores: Ice Age, RoboSockets: Link Me Up! and a Mac game Tulula: Legend Of A Volcano. Together all apps have been downloaded to over 8.9 million devices. Games by Tatem vary in gameplay and target audience from casual titles (RoboSockets, Racer) to hard-core hunting simulation series Carnivores.

The company currently has 2 offices in Ukraine. All games are developed on in-house built technology which makes development cycle fast, flawless and enables easy porting to Android and WP7 platforms. Our distribution partners are Apple, Google, Microsoft, HTC, Motorola and Samsung, Openfeint, Papaya Mobile, TapJoy. We have developer relationships with BigFishGames, MumboJumbo,MindJolt. More information about our company can be found at: www.tatemgames.com
